comment.author: 78798974@N02
comment._content: This is amazing. The glassblower with the pale coloured shirt on, in the centre of the picture, happens to be my grandfather. Crown Crystal brought him to Australia from Germany in 1932 to work for them.

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Dear LenoreAW, if you would like us to add his name to the Catalog record at the Library, please let us know. We love to have people in our photographs identified and you can include deatils of his life in Europe and Australia if you wish.
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment.author: 78798974@N02
comment._content:
That would be great. Who would I contact regarding this?

Lenore
